titles.title: Improving Language Access in Mortgage Servicing Act of 2024
Improving Language Access in Mortgage Servicing Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act and the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 to establish language access requirements for creditors and servicers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
